TELEMETRY REF AF_ASSERT_4 BIG_ENDIAN "An assert happened"
    <%=render "_ref_tlm_evr_hdr.txt", locals: {id: 345} %>

    APPEND_ITEM FILE_LENGTH 16 UINT "Length of String Arg"
    APPEND_ITEM FILE 0 STRING "The source file of the assert"
    ITEM LINE -160 32 UINT "Line number of the assert"
    ITEM ARG1 -128 32 UINT "First assert argument"
    ITEM ARG2 -96 32 UINT "Second assert argument"
    ITEM ARG3 -64 32 UINT "Third assert argument"
    ITEM ARG4 -32 32 UINT "Fourth assert argument"

    ITEM MESSAGE 0 0 DERIVED "Formatted String for Argument"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf("Assert in file %s, line %d: %d %d %d %d" , packet.read('file') , packet.read('line') , packet.read('arg1') , packet.read('arg2') , packet.read('arg3') , packet.read('arg4') )
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
      META FORMAT_STRING "Assert in file %s, line %d: %d %d %d %d"
      META ARGS file line arg1 arg2 arg3 arg4 
    ITEM EVR_SEVERITY 0 0 DERIVED "Severity"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf('FATAL')
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
